title: "Island Time" remixed serif face from the Tommy Bahama website
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/island-time_3635.jpg)

Any idea what this font is from the Tommy Bahama Web Site?
author: payback99

comments.content: Looks like somebody had some fun with Times or something, but I don't know if this was specifically made for the Tommy Bahama website or if this is a free- or shareware remix.

I found it using “What the Font”

It’s Thymesans
